title: If our award ceremonies did a goof up like Oscars 2017, here’s how Shahid Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, Ranbir Kapoor would have reacted
text: Shahid Kapoor If our award ceremonies did a… If our award ceremonies did a goof up like Oscars 2017, here’s how Shahid Kapoor, Sonam Kapoor, Ranbir Kapoor would have reacted The Oscars 2017 will be an event that no one will forget any time soon, at least those who have watched the entire show. Two minutes of silence for those souls who switched off their television sets o By Sreeju Sudhakaran | Published: February 28, 2017 9:20 am
